welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Phoenixville, where the charm of a small town meets the excitement of a bustling city. Known for its historic charm and beautiful landscapes, we invite you to explore and experience all that our vibrant city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private aviation and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments and freight services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at North Philadelphia Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
